entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: 2.1.3 - Pagination, more configuration options and customizing homescreen
entry.content:
2.1.3 Load more assets automatically in slider/screensaver for recents/seasonal/random. Set the selected position of the grid to the selected asset in the slideshow when closing slideshow

2.1 Filter persons without a name Add configuration options for seasonal years back, seasonal period and recent images months back Customize homescreen by being able to remove items

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: Photo transformations and animation speed setting
entry.content: Add configurable photo transformations including a "safe center crop" with a configurable maximum cutoff percentage Add setting for animation speed in slideshow

entry.title: New release for Immich Android TV: Folder view and album assets pagination
entry.content: Use timeline/buckets for fetching assets from albums to speed up loading massive albums Folder view
